name: Best Ever Chili
description: When we say “best ever,” we know what we’re talking about. Cozy up with a big bowl of chili that'll warm you up from the inside out! This one-pot wonder is perfect for when you need something hearty and comforting on chilly weeknights or when tailgating with friends. It’s great for big-batch cooking, so you’ll have plenty to share!
preparation: In Sauté Pan, cook ground beef over medium-high heat until browned. Using Ground Meat Separator, break up chunks.
Stir in seasoning, tomatoes, beans, and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; partially cover and simmer 15–18 min, stirring occasionally, until cooked to your liking.
tips: Swap beef with ground chicken, turkey, pork, or a meat alternative, and cook with 1 tbsp oil.
For a vegetarian option, take out the ground beef and add two extra cans of beans (three cans in total). Try a medley of different kinds of beans for some variety!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Top chili with 1 tbsp each cheddar cheese and sour cream, and serve with 1 small dinner roll, and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
